title: Obama

attachments.title: Request from Senator Barack Obama and Obama Exploratory Committee
Comment on AOR by Democracy 21 and Campaign Legal Center
Amendment to OGC Draft (Chairman Lenhard, Vice Chairman Mason), Agenda Document 07-12-A
Comment on OGC Draft by Patricia A. Fiori

summary: Presidential candidate may solicit and receive private contributions for the general election while retaining the option of refunding the contributions and receiving public funds for the general election if he receives his party's nomination.
